title: Google App
text: Lens Lens Shop what you see Spot something you like? Use your camera or a screenshot to look up who makes it, how much it costs, and where to buy it. Lens Lens Translate what you see Use your camera to instantly translate menus, signs, handwriting, or anything else in over 100 languages. Voice Voice Search what you sing Tap the mic icon to identify the song around you. You can also find the song by humming, no lyrics needed. AR AR See it in your space Explore the natural world from animals to landmarks in AR in your own space with the Google app. Discover Discover Discover more of what you love Find more around your interests all in one place. Sequences shortened and simulated. Results for illustrative purposes. Check responses for accuracy. Requires internet connection. Available in select countries and languages. Results may vary depending on audio & visual matches. Requires internet connection. Try it now in the Google app
